short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically logs you into Calnet stuff

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BearAuthenticator stores your CalNet login credentials in local storage after your first successful login and after that, helps automatically login to auth.berkeley.edu every time when you visit the page. 

Enjoy and Go Bears!
